minions.name: The Count
minions.description: Ongoing: After another player's minion is destroyed, place a +1 power counter on this minion

minions.name: Nightstalker
minions.description: Destroy a minion of power 2 or less here to place a +1 power counter on this minion

minions.name: Heavy Drinker
minions.description: You may destroy one of your minions to place a +1 power counter on this minion

minions.name: Fledgling Vampire
minions.description: After you play this minion, if another player has more power here than you do, place a +1 power counter on this minion

actions.name: Crack of Dusk
actions.description: Play a minion of power 2 or less from your discard pile as an extra minion. Place a +1 power counter on it

actions.name: Dinner Date
actions.description: Place a +1 power counter on your minion. Destroy a minion of power 2 or less at that minion's base

actions.name: Big Gulp
actions.description: Destroy a minion of power 4 or less

actions.name: Buffet
actions.description: Special: Play after a base scores. If you were the winner, place a +1 power counter on each of your minions

actions.name: Cull the Weak
actions.description: Choose your minion. Discard any number of minion cards from your hand. For each minion discarded, place a +1 power counter on that minion

actions.name: Mad Monster Party
actions.description: Place a +1 power counter on each of your minions that does not have one

actions.name: Opportunist
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: After another player's minion is destroyed, place a +1 power counter on this minion

actions.name: Summon Wolves
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, place a +1 power counter on this card. If you have a minion here, counters on this card add to your power total
